snippet.title: Chinatris Trailer
snippet.description:
Chinatris is a game about Chinese characters. 

In the game you can combine Chinese character components to form different characters, just like in Tetris. Your goal is to form the target characters from the level to move forward. During the process you will meet many unexpected characters which will give you another look of Chinese culture.

Don't know how to pronounce Chinese characters? Don't worry, pronunciation will appear when you form a new character. Some unique characters will be designed as Steam achievements, how many can you achieve?
 
You'll have different Chinese characters falling just like in Tetris and you'll be able to combine them into new characters. When you finish forming the target characters on the level you win.
You can play it to challenge yourself while using it as a fun way to learn Chinese!
 
Please wishlist Chinatris and follow us to get the latest news about it.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1139800/
